Class DiagnosisCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Patient.DiagnosisCreator

extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates Diagnoses and introduces them in a safe way to the world

      • makeNormalDiagnosis

        public java.lang.String makeNormalDiagnosis(java.lang.String content,
                                   Doctor doctor)
                                     throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                                            PatientIsDischargedException,
                                            InvalidArgumentException
        Creates a normal diagnosis
        Parameters:
        content - the content of the diagnosis
        doctor - the doctor that enters the diagnosis
        Returns:
        a description of the diagnosis
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException
        PatientIsDischargedException
        InvalidArgumentException - if doctor was null

      • makeSecondOpinionDiagnosis

        public java.lang.String makeSecondOpinionDiagnosis(java.lang.String content,
                                          Doctor original,
                                          Doctor approvalOf)
                                            throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                                                   PatientIsDischargedException,
                                                   InvalidArgumentException
        Creates a diagnosis that needs approval.
        Parameters:
        content -
        original - The original doctor
        approvalOf - The doctor that needs to give approval
        Returns:
        a description of the created diagnosis
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException
        PatientIsDischargedException
        InvalidArgumentException - if doctor or approvalOf were null.
